sentences.english: The identifications of equipments and their components should be easy to trace.

sentences.english: Feed box can not be used to resolve steel trays bearing placed spare parts or the disadvantages of bulk materials.

sentences.english: Loading piece parts and positioning well.
Put away the parts now. We can continue assembling them in the afternoon.

sentences.english: Another structure parts and the small apart piece, Adopt the tower crane to hoist .
